title: Moores Creek National Battlefield: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         Just another day in the creek! Ricardo Perez  Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the different volunteer opportunities available at Volunteer.gov. We would love to have you as a part of the Moores Creek family!  Bring your skills and talents and help us to preserve one of America's special places.   Volunteer Opportunities include, but not limited to:   Visitor Center Operations Living History / Historical Interpretation Education / Guided Tours Special Events Building and Grounds Maintenance Administration Marketing and Social Media Internships and Job Shadowing  For more information on these and other volunteer opportunities, please contact the Volunteer Coordinator.
